faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our GSE equipment and related services.

items.question: What certifications do your equipment have?
items.answer: All our equipment complies with Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC and EN 12312-1 standard. Each product is delivered with EU declaration of conformity, SWL test certificate and user manual.

items.question: Is the RL125-02 compatible with my helicopter?
items.answer: The RL125-02 is designed for H125/AS350 (Ø80 mm skids). Adaptations are available for EC120, EC130 and other models via interchangeable skid kits.

items.question: What are your delivery times?
items.answer: For stocked references (RL125-02, standard platforms), allow 2 to 4 weeks for mainland France. Custom productions require 6 to 10 weeks.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance contracts?
items.answer: Yes, LLEDO Industries offers preventive maintenance contracts including full inspection, hydraulic checks, SWL testing and wear parts replacement.

items.question: What is the warranty?
items.answer: Standard warranty is 24 months parts and labor. Extensions up to 5 years are available, including preventive maintenance and equipment loan.

items.question: How to get a customized study?
items.answer: Contact us via the online form, by phone or email. Indicate the helicopter model, volume and your operational constraints to receive a recommendation.
